providers.description: Administers child care financial assistance through the Virginia Child Care Subsidy Program.
providers.eligibility: Culpeper County residents meeting state eligibility guidelines.
providers.name: Culpeper County Department of Social Services - Child Care Subsidy

providers.address: Headquarters 96 Laurel Hill Road, P.O. Box 937, Verona, VA 24482
providers.description: Blue Ridge Area Food Bank is a nonprofit organization that provides food assistance through a network of partner agencies, including food pantries, soup kitchens, shelters, and community programs. The organization distributes millions of pounds of food annually and operates mobile food pantries and direct distribution programs to serve individuals and families experiencing hunger across central and western Virginia.
providers.eligibility: Individuals and families experiencing food insecurity within the service area. Specific eligibility requirements may vary by partner pantry or distribution site.
providers.hours: Operating hours for all warehouses are 7:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday through Friday.
providers.name: Blue Ridge Area Food Bank

providers.description: An outreach ministry of St. Stephen’s Episcopal Church, it began in 1984 and operates as a full community effort, through the dedicated work of over 80 volunteers from our area. Food and monetary donations are received from local businesses, organizations, churches, and generous individuals. These donations may provide over 3,500 meals weekly for families and individuals, in the town and county of Culpeper
providers.eligibility: The Culpeper Food Closet provides food and personal care items to Culpeper families, individuals, and seniors in need of assistance.
providers.hours:
Monday-Wendesday | 9 AM – 12 PM
Thursdays | 4 PM – 6 PM
Friday | 9 AM – 12 PM
providers.name: Culpeper Food Closet
